mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_users (username, password, enabled, roles) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{enabled}, #{roles})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, enabled, roles FROM project_users
SELECT pu.id, pu.username, pu.password, pu.enabled, pu.roles FROM project_users pu WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM project_submissions ps WHERE ps.user_id = pu.id AND ps.project_name = #{projectName} )

SELECT pu.id, pu.username, pu.password, pu.enabled, pu.roles FROM project_users pu WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM project_submissions ps WHERE ps.user_id = pu.id AND ps.project_name = #{projectName} )

SELECT pu.id, pu.username, pu.roles, MAX(ps.score) AS score FROM project_users pu JOIN project_submissions ps ON ps.user_id = pu.id WHERE ps.project_name = #{projectName} GROUP BY pu.id, pu.username, pu.roles ORDER BY pu.id
